name: Oluwasegun Oluwatomiwa Odunlade
bio: My name is Oluwasegun Oluwatomiwa Odunlade and I am the General Secretary of NUMSA 23/24 administration. I hail from Osun State, was born in Kaduna and have lived most of my life in Abuja. I love playing video games, drawing and looking for trouble during my free time. I believe I am friendly and approachable, but I bite when prompted to.
